I don’t understand why more people aren’t talking about this. 

They don’t supply work phones, nor give a reasonable reimbursement for a separate device, but expect employees to allow ALL network traffic to be monitored. 

The alternative is to have no access on mobile.
content.html: I don’t understand why more people aren’t talking about this. They don’t supply work phones, nor give a reasonable reimbursement for a separate device, but expect employees to allow ALL network traffic to be monitored. The alternative is to have no access on mobile.

content: Very hot take - your employer should never force you to use then install security monitoring  on a personal device which can be legitimately used to watch porn, sext, perform financial transactions, call your sponsor, or anything else that you reasonably could be blackmailed for.
